name: Qdrant
short_desc: High-performance vector database for AI applications
description: Qdrant is a vector similarity search engine and vector database. It provides a production-ready service with a convenient API to store, search, and manage vectors with additional payload. Perfect for semantic search, recommendations, and AI applications.
author: Qdrant

form_fields.label: API Key (optioneel, laat leeg om uit te schakelen)
form_fields.hint: Stel een API key in om de Qdrant API te beveiligen
